item.title: Full Stack DevOps Engineer?
item.description: Speaker Feng Warnings The following content is sythesised with talkings and my experience Photo of Event History Diverge and Converge The speaker shared about the evolution of software developing. If we looked back the history of software developing, all the requirement and architecture is simple. When complexity of application is increasing, developing team can not afford task of operations any more,such as loading balance and performance tuning.
